name: Ominous Futures
description: There it is again, that funny feeling. Something is coming. It's late pandemia 2021, and there's the big question by the current generation: "What is the future?" The lockdowns, millions of deaths, the climate, mass unemployment, wars, uprisings against injustice, housing crisis, dark memories of the past clawing their way out. We have a universal experience rising up inside. The pandemic, especially, revealed that THIS is not working for us, that many of us workers are so disposable, sacrificial lambs, under "capitalism", in a planet that is dying. Now do we just become nihilists, anticapitalist activists? No, that's not it at all. We have to survive and live our lives. We are simply becoming mindful all at once about our own disillusionment with the way the labour system works. Now, what is next?
